summary: The sprint planning architect recapped the history of previous sprints, including completed user stories for a local HR tool MVP, challenges with Supabase resolved by switching to SQLite, and outlined the current backlog. The discussion sought to align on priorities for the next sprint to ensure end-to-end functionality and progress toward features like profile updates and leave requests.

actions.task: Specify priorities for the current sprint, such as fixing SQLite migration (US-017), building profile updates (US-002), or starting leave requests (US-003/US-005)

risks.risk: Flaky Supabase integration causing crashes on local runs
risks.mitigation: Pivoted to pure local SQLite for Phase 1 to ensure lightweight, no-cloud setup with persistent data
